code: import config from'../config';var PeopleService={getPeople:function getPeople(){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/people"),{method:'GET',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'}}).then(function(res){return!res.ok?res.json().then(function(event){return Promise.reject(event);}):res.json();});},addPerson:function addPerson(person){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/people"),{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({person:person})}).then(function(res){return!res.ok?res.json().then(function(event){return Promise.reject(event);}):res.json();});}};export default PeopleService;
